channel.title: Amazing Black Mesa Playthough Weekend Experience.
channel.description:
What an experience I had over the weekend playing this. Absolutely fucking amazing!!! Black Mesa (First Part) + Good Brooklyn Hydro = Unforgettable Experience.
I enjoyed the entire game but my favorite parts are the first two chapters and the last chapter - The Lambda Core.
What about you guys?

item.title: Amazing Black Mesa Playthough Weekend Experience.
item.dc:creator: Xyos
item.description:
Just got the Gauss Rifle, and loving every minute of it. Played a lot over the weekend, luckily was off from work! Truely a modern masterpice in the game community!

Read full topic
item.source: Amazing Black Mesa Playthough Weekend Experience.
